pitch.cc: Francisco Liriano showed faith in Drew Butera by throwing that slider in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
That was pitch number 45 for Francisco Liriano; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .197 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .296 off him after that.
